documents.document:
How many House MD seasons there will be?

How many House MD seasons there will be?

House MD is a good tv show for watching during my leisure time and I know it has finished the 8th season. I wonder whether there will be any other season of the show!
A1: Yes, House MD has finished the 8th season and it is the final season of the show. I finished it on House MD series DVD. I love this show every much. I watch all the seasons of the show!
comes from: http://www.dvdsea.com/products/House-MD-Seasons-1-8-DVD-Boxset-DVDS-2939.html

More tv series for watching: The Golden Girls dvd, Southland dvd

What were you're favorite house md seasons?

After watching all the 8 seasons on House MD DVD, I think the former 5 seasons are the best seasons which I love the most. What’s your opinion on the show?

A2: Yes, I think the former 5 seasons are more interesting that the later seasons. They fives seasons focus on the medicine and the later seasons focus on the drama. But actually, I enjoyed all the seasons of the show. It doesn't really matter to me what team house has. they're all very good

Supernatural is a nice TV series for watching. After finish the Supernatural DVD seasons 1-7, I’m waiting for the 8th season. When will it come back?

A1: It is said that the 8th season will broadcast in October 2012 this year. I’m waiting for it, too. Nice TV show!

Would I like the TV show Supernatural?

I've been looking for a good TV series to watch and I've heard a few good reviews on supernatural. Is it a nice show for watching?

What Is The Best Season Of The Simpsons?

The Simpsons has been finished The Simpsons DVD 23th season and some people said that The Simpsons are past their prime. What time period do you think the best episodes came out and what is your favorite season?
A1: I think different people have different ideas. In my opinion, I believe season 4 is the top season. First of all my favorite episode, "Mr. Plow", is in season 4. That's a classic episode with the funny commercials Homer and Barney made promoting their businesses, the fact the two of them figured out in the end that their friendship was more important then money, and it was great seeing that Barney is capable of more then being just that guy we see at Moe's constantly.
comes from: http://www.travelpod.com/travel-blog-entries/lydiamath11/2/1343063316/tpod.html?view=preview
Army Wives DVD, Glee DVD

When did the simpsons TV show start?

The Simpsons is a nice tv show for watching, and I started watching last week. I want to know when the show started and how many seasons the show has. Thanks.
A6: The Simpsons DVD is perfect for your watching! The Simpsons first appeared in a series of minute long shorts on The Tracey Ullman Show. The first of these shorts aired April 19, 1987. This was the first ever appearance of the Simpsons. There are 23 seasons of the show. It may cost you a long time to finish it but it is worthy.
comes from: http://www.friendster.com/avatar/201573823/wall_activities/post/500e6a37304a593918000017

Who is your favorite character on desperate housewives?

Who is your least favorite? Why?

A1: In Desperate Housewives DVD, My favorite character is Gabrielle Solis, now Gabrielle Marquez because i can identify most with her! My least favorite character is Edie because she is always really mean and desperate and uses people.

I love Desperate Housewives, but i dont really know what is my favourite episode. I love this show. What is your favourite desperate housewives episode?

A6: I think this is a great show for watching! After watching Desperate Housewives DVD, I think all the episodes are good. But there is one episode makes me cry that is about the handy man, was my favorite. it made me cry it was so touching.

What are Disney's current thoughts on coming back to tradit

I love the Disney’s traditional animation and I wonders whether they will come back to make the traditional animations. I love all the animations on Disney DVD.

A1: The traditionally-animated film before The Princess and the Frog was Home on the Range. It did very poorly, and Disney decided it would be the LAST traditionally animated film. Several years later they relented with The Princess and the Frog. I think these days the computer-generated animation is cheaper, even as beautifully and elaborately as they do it.
comes from: http://livon.tv/activity/p/147130/
more tv shows in Cheap DVD shop: Family Guy DVD, The Simpsons DVD

Walt Disney Animations

Please give some names of the Walt Disney Animation which are moving or funny. Thanks!

A6: I'll assume that you are looking for the good ones. These are the top 5 in my opinion, I've seen every Disney Movie (animated/not animated) at least a dozen times each). So pick your poison... 1) Sleeping Beauty (classic, romance story) 2) Lilo and Stitch (hilarious) 3) Aladdin (most badass and funny at the same time) 4) Lion King (overall, just amazing) 5) Mulan (2nd most funny)

I got the Disney DVD and there is a list of the classic Disney Animations. It’s great!
more tv shows in Cheap DVD shop: Family Guy DVD, The Simpsons DVD

In NCIS seasons 9 there was an episode i cannot mind?

Life beofre his eyes and Playing with fire. There was a scene where Gibbs says to someone about staying safe, something to do with tides. I would love to know this quote because I want it maybe as a tattoo, can someone please tell me they know what i am talking about and tell me the quote please

A1: I definitely wouldn't want to get this wrong, esp if it's gonna be something that you're going to have tattooed on you, so could you give us some more info? I checked and there are 8 episodes between "Life Before His Eyes" and "Playing with Fire". I'm a huge NCIS seasons 1-9 dvd series fan, have seen every episode at least twice...won’t even talk about how many times I've seen some of the early season episodes that are on all the time on USA.
comes from: http://completeseasons.blogspot.com/2012/08/in-ncis-seasons-9-there-was-episode-i.html

Can I start watching One Tree Hill with Season 7?

I’ve got the season 7 of One Tree Hill DVD series from my friend and I want to know can I start watching the series from here? Or should I watch the seasons 1-6 before?

A1: If I were you, I should start from the season 1. I think this is a great show for watching! If miss the beginning of the show, you will miss a lot of things. It is so good, and you will get so much more meaning behind everything and you won't feel so lost. Enjoy your time!

What do you think you NCIS and what’s your favorite charac

Have you watched the crime tv series NCIS DVD seasons 1-9 series online? I have just finished the 9th season. It is amazing! What’s you favorite character in this great tv show?

A6: Yes, I agree with you. NCIS is the one that I love the most. The story and the characters are perfect. I think Abbys amazing!! I love the relationship she has with Gibbs and how he bribes her with her soda. And DiNozzo is as well! The sexy guy is so funny! Loved the episode when his car got stolen and was in a high speed chase in a motorway and got smashed!!

How many seasons of one tree hill are there?

I know that there are totally 9 seasons of the TV series One Tree Hill, but I wonder if that is it or if there are any more seasons of it?

A3: Yes, online sale One Tree Hill DVD series has finished the 9th season and the 9th season is the final season of the show! The last season of the show ended this year. It is a pity for the fans. This is really a good tv show for watching. I love the show and want to have another time watching!

How I met your mother question?

DVDSEA

After watching How I Met Your Mother DVD, I don’t know why does the future Ted refer to his friends as Uncle/Aunt? I thought Ted was only friends with them. Is one of them related to him?

A1: Many times, people consider good friends to be like family to them, and so they treat friends like brothers or sisters. Using terms like "Uncle" and "Aunt" doesn't necessarily mean they are related.

comes from: http://forum.to.com.pl/how-i-met-your-mother-question-t19387/

more dvds in discount dvd store: the walking dead dvd, disney dvd

DVDSEA

After watching How I Met Your Mother DVD, I think it is so great that has so many good datas. I want to take her on a date that recreates one from the show. Any possible recreation?

A6: Ted and Robin's first date where he tells her that I love you. I think this is great for you to date your girlfriend. How I Met Your Mother is really a good show for dates!

What are Disney's current thoughts on coming back to tradit

DVDSEA

I love the Disney’s traditional animation and I wonders whether they will come back to make the traditional animations. I love all the animations on Disney DVD.

A1: The traditionally-animated film before The Princess and the Frog was Home on the Range. It did very poorly, and Disney decided it would be the LAST traditionally animated film. Several years later they relented with The Princess and the Frog. I think these days the computer-generated animation is cheaper, even as beautifully and elaborately as they do it.

What Disney DVD movie is the most heart touching and can bri

DVDSEA

There must be one Disney DVD movies which moves you the most and which one you love the most?

A2: Yes, Disney movies can be heart touching and move us a lot. For me, the most impressive animation is the Lion King. I watched it for the first time in a long time about a month ago. gosh! i was trying to fight back the tears when Scar let Mufasa fall into the stampede and Simba saw his father die!

Does the season 5 of True Blood come to an end?

DVDSEA

I love True Blood but I have no time to watch the new season. I want to know how many episodes there are in the season 5. Does it come to the end?

A1: What a pity you missed the season 5. It is so great. The fifth season of the show totally 12 episodes and it came to the end on August 26, 2012. I watched the season 5 but I also want to buy the True Blood DVD for a second time watching!

Do I need to watch all of Breaking Bad seasons to understand

DVDSEA

Interested in starting to watch Breaking Bad, just wondering If i should start from scratch or if I will be able to watch on from the latest season.

A1: Hello! I think you should watch it from the very beginning to enjoy t he show and know what is going on. If you do that, you’ll find out how Walt got started how he met Jesse how they go involved with gus. For me, this is a great show. You’ll love the show more, if you watch all of it! Breaking Bad DVD box set is perfect for you to enjoy the show!
